name: D12 500 PRO M2 MONO DUAL 0.4 nozzle
printer_model: Wanhao D12 500 PRO M2 MONO DUAL
machine_end_gcode:
; Wanhao D12-500 Default End Gcode
G1 E-30 F6000
G4 P3000
G92 E0
G1 E-40 F6000
M400
M107
M106 S0                        
M104 S0                        
M140 S0                       
G91                          
G1 Z5 F1200                   
G90                            
G1 X0 Y235 F1200
M84
machine_start_gcode:
; Wanhao D12-500 Start G-code
G21
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]    ; Set Extruder temperature
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer]      ; Set Heat Bed temperature
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]    ; Wait for Extruder temperature
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer]     ; Wait for Heat Bed temperature
G91
G28
;G29
G90
M117
G92 E0
T{initial_tool}
G1 X0 Y0 ; Home all axes
G1 Z2.0 F3000 ; Move Z Axis up little to prevent scratching of Heat Bed
G1 X0.1 Y20 Z0.3 F5000.0 ; Move to start position
G1 X0.1 Y200.0 Z0.3 F1500.0 E15 ; Draw the first line
G1 X0.4 Y200.0 Z0.3 F5000.0 ; Move to side a little
G1 X0.4 Y20 Z0.3 F1500.0 E30 ; Draw the second line
G92 E0 ; Reset Extruder
G1 Z2.0 F3000 ; Move Z Axis up little to prevent scratching of Heat Bed
G1 X5 Y20 Z0.3 F5000.0 ; Move over to
